itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Post Malone stealing his new beer pong show from us, why it's important to make your own content, what the repercussions would be President Trump withdraws troops from overseas, and Dan tells us why climate change is bullsh*t even if we all switch to electric cars in the future.
